title: Bob Marley & Jesus Christ
subtitle_html: Why Bob Marley Is My Personal Jesus
author: Tom W. Hartung
card_content_html: These images show that Bob Marley and Jesus Christ have similar personalities. The colors in these images illustrate the Jungian archetypes that form the basis of the four-letter types popularized by the MBTI®. The Blue in these spiritual portraits show that both of them tend to be idealistic in general — and spiritual in particular. The Red represents their tendency to be emotional in general — and people-oriented in particular.
card_first_person_html: My subjective, personal opinion, possibly using the first person or containing a link, if desired.
